contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
玛丽在向面试官查尔斯先生询问薪资报酬情况。

contents.title: 玛丽：查尔斯先生，我感到我们之间的谈话非常令人愉快。
contents.answer: Mr. Charles, I feel that we have had a very pleasant talk.

contents.title: 查尔斯：我也这么认为，现在你对我们公司也有了一个大致的了解。
contents.answer: I think so too, and you have a general understanding of the company now.

contents.title: 玛丽：是的，贵公司在业内是个大公司，很有潜力。
contents.answer: Yes, your company is a big one in the field and has great potential.

contents.title: 查尔斯：你还想了解些什么呢？
contents.answer: What else do you want to know?

contents.content: 面试时如何谈薪资待遇
面试时谈薪资一直是个让人头疼的话题，尤其是对于初涉职场的毕业生来说，很多情况下都是处于被动的状态。有些求职者甚至对此避而不谈，入职后才发现得到的薪资跟自己的期望有很大差距。

contents.title: 玛丽：我想了解一下贵公司的薪资情况。
contents.answer: I want to know about the salary information in your company.

contents.title: 查尔斯：那么，你一个月想要多少报酬呢？
contents.answer: Then, how much do you wish to be paid each month?

contents.title: 玛丽：我希望转正之后的起薪是3000元。
contents.answer: I hope my starting salary will be 3,000 yuan a month if I become a formal worker.

contents.title: 查尔斯：我们付给你的起薪会比你期望的还要多。
contents.answer: We will give you more than what you hope.

contents.title: 玛丽：真的吗？这对我来说是个好消息。
contents.answer: Really? That's good news for me.

contents.title: 查尔斯：进入公司之后我们有6个月的实习期，在此期间，你每个月2500元。实习期过后，每个月3500元。
contents.answer: You will have a six-month internship after you enter our company. During this period you can get 2,500 yuan a month, and after that you can get 3,500 yuan per month.

contents.content: 求职者如果在面试前对公司有一个总体的了解，那么在面试中就可以很自如地提出自己的薪资要求了。提前了解公司的薪金制度有助于求职者在面试过程中从容应对薪资方面的交谈，不至于太过唐突而不知如何处理。

contents.title: 玛丽：听起来真的很棒。
contents.answer: It sounds great!

contents.title: 查尔斯：年底还会有奖金，并且如果你能够在公司坚持工作下去的话，每年都会涨工资。
contents.answer: You can also get a bonus at the end of the year, and if you can keep working in the company, your salary will get a raise every year.

contents.title: 玛丽：顺便问一下，每周工作几天？
contents.answer: By the way, how many days do we work every week?

contents.title: 查尔斯：每周5天，但是如果工作忙的话，偶尔也需要加班。
contents.answer: Five days every week, but if it is necessary, you need to work overtime once in a while.

contents.title: 玛丽：好的，我知道了。
contents.answer: OK, I see.

contents.content: 有些求职者可能会觉得自己缺乏工作经验，没有勇气跟公司谈薪资方面的问题，其实大可不必。薪资问题是每位求职者都应该关注的，因为它关系到自己的切身利益，但是切忌在面试一开始时就谈论薪资，以免公司认为你是个好高骛远的人。

contents.title: 1.你们公司的薪资怎么样？
contents.answer: How about the salary in your company?

contents.title: 2.我希望每年都能加薪。
contents.answer: I wish to get a raise in salary every year.

contents.title: 3.我希望月薪2500元起。
contents.answer: I hope for a starting salary of 2500 yuan per month.

contents.title: 4.我能接受试用期工资低一点。
contents.answer: I can accept that I have a lower salary in the probation period.

contents.title: 5.如果加班，我希望能够得到加班费。
contents.answer: If I work overtime, I hope to get an overtime fee.

contents.title: 6.这是基本工资吗？
contents.answer: Is this the base salary?

contents.title: 7.我想了解一下你们公司的薪资情况。
contents.answer: I want to know something about salary information in your company.

contents.title: 8.我相信公司会提供给我一份令人满意的薪金。
contents.answer: I believe the company will provide me with a satisfactory salary.

contents.title: 9.我希望年底可以得到奖金。
contents.answer: I hope that I can receive a bonus at the end of the year.

contents.title: 10.我想了解一下公司的薪资标准。
contents.answer: I want to know about the standard of pay in the company.

contents.hanyi: n. 奖金，额外津贴，分红

contents.content: premium pay 加班工资，假日工资
